name: Dogs Club
description:
Dogs Club is a challenging parkour game that can be played in Singleplayer and Multiplayer. Complete the tracks in the fastest time and take yourself and your country to the top of the leaderboard.

Dogs Club game with different types of dogs that you can choose from in the game, be the first to finish the difficult tracks in the first place. Gain new skills by completing the tracks and dog training.

Through the Leaderboard, other players will be able to see your rank on the track and you will compete with them for the "BEST TIME SCORE".

Gameplay

  • You Have to Be Fast!
  • Your Reflexes Must Be Strong!
  • You Will Get Rank As You Pass the Obstacles!
